name: eerie-impulse
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
